welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Saint-Martin-de-Crau! This charming Provençal town is known for its picturesque landscapes, delicious cuisine, and rich history. We invite you to explore and soak up the beauty of this quaint French gem. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Avignon-Caumont Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal of Marseille Provence Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal mainly used for low-cost airlines and regional flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Aix-en-Provence Aerodrome Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Aix-en-Provence Aerodrome Airport, mainly used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
